title: Ep. 123 - Huge Upside for Small-Cap Technology
itunes:title: Huge Upside for Small-Cap Technology
description: Lou Basenese, chief investment strategist at Wall Street Daily, has an exceptional track record for picking small-cap tech stocks. In this interview, he shares his favorite ideas including a data storage and marketing analytical company
